pr_title: Bugfix rntbd diagnostics to include rntbd timeline on the failure

timeline.message: fixes diagnostics to include rntbd timeline on the failure

timeline.bodyText: Can we add a small test case by getting error and checking for request timeline in diagnostics. 404 or wrong Pk will do the work ?
timeline.author: simplynaveen20

replies.bodyText: good suggestion. I will include the test in the PR. thanks @simplynaveen20
replies.author: moderakh
